message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $110. I think it's a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $95 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer. I'm willing to come down a bit to $105.  That's still a fair price considering the value of the product.  Let's see if we can agree on this.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counter with a price of $100 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise considering its value.
